message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DM, cs.CR, cs.CC, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the construction and properties of codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The concept of conflict-avoiding codes is related to error-correcting codes, which is a topic in cryptography (cs.CR) and coding theory (cs.CC). The paper also involves some computational aspects, such as explicit constructions of codes, which could fall under numerical analysis (cs.NA).
